name: Nightbear (MantaMiddleware, Sam Tudor)
description:
The child is asleep for the night, which is just when the monsters attack. But it will be okay, because he has his trusty Nightbear to protect him from the nightmares.

Take control of Nightbear to defend against the monsters of your child's dream world in this light horror action-RPG game.

MAC NOTE: I don't have a Mac, and there is a known bug building a Mac build from the Windows Unity editor where the files do not have the correct file permissions to execute. There is a workaround described here using Terminal to fix the issue.

LINUX NOTE: None of us have Linux, this build is entirely untested.
